item.title: [afc] Knight of Autumn
item.description:
Creature — Dryad Knight

When Knight of Autumn enters the battlefield, choose one —

• Put two +1/+1 counters on Knight of Autumn.

• Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

• You gain 4 life.

item.title: [afc] Hostage Taker
item.description:
Creature — Human Pirate

When Hostage Taker enters the battlefield, exile another target creature or artifact until Hostage Taker leaves the battlefield. You may cast that card for as long as it remains exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any type to cast that spell.

item.title: [afc] Vanish into Memory
item.description:
Instant

Exile target creature. You draw cards equal to that creature's power. At the beginning of your next upkeep, return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control. If you do, discard cards equal to that creature's toughness.

item.title: [afc] Utter End
item.description:
Instant

Exile target nonland permanent.

item.title: [afc] Theater of Horrors
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library.

During your turn, if an opponent lost life this turn, you may play lands and cast spells from among cards exiled with Theater of Horrors.

{3}{R}: Theater of Horrors deals 1 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

item.title: [afc] Terminate
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

item.title: [afc] Shielding Plax
item.description:
Enchantment — Aura

({G/U} can be paid with either {G} or {U}.)

Enchant creature

When Shielding Plax enters the battlefield, draw a card.

Enchanted creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.

item.title: [afc] Chaos Wand
item.description:
Artifact

{4}, {T}: Target opponent exiles cards from the top of their library until they exile an instant or sorcery card. You may cast that card without paying its mana cost. Then put the exiled cards that weren't cast this way on the bottom of that library in a random order.

item.title: [afc] Burnished Hart
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Elk

{3}, Sacrifice Burnished Hart: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [afc] Basilisk Collar
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature has deathtouch and lifelink.

Equip {2}

item.title: [afc] Argentum Armor
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +6/+6.

Whenever equipped creature attacks, destroy target permanent.

Equip {6}

item.title: [afc] Arcane Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

item.title: [afc] Fellwar Stone
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.

item.title: [afc] Explorer's Scope
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Whenever equipped creature attacks, look at the top card of your library. If it's a land card, you may put it onto the battlefield tapped.

Equip {1} ({1}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [afc] Dragon's Hoard
item.description:
Artifact

Whenever a Dragon enters the battlefield under your control, put a gold counter on Dragon's Hoard.

{T}, Remove a gold counter from Dragon's Hoard: Draw a card.

{T}: Add one mana of any color.

item.title: [afc] Commander's Sphere
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

item.title: [afc] Colossus Hammer
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +10/+10 and loses flying.

Equip {8} ({8}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

item.title: [afc] Mind Stone
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}.

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Mind Stone: Draw a card.

item.title: [afc] Meteor Golem
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

When Meteor Golem enters the battlefield, destroy target nonland permanent an opponent controls.

item.title: [afc] Masterwork of Ingenuity
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

You may have Masterwork of Ingenuity enter the battlefield as a copy of any Equipment on the battlefield.

item.title: [afc] Heirloom Blade
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +3/+1.

Whenever equipped creature dies, you may reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a creature card that shares a creature type with it. Put that card into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

Equip {1}

item.title: [afc] Gruul Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}: Add {R}{G}.

item.title: [afc] Sword of the Animist
item.description:
Legendary Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature gets +1/+1.

Whenever equipped creature attacks, you may search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

Equip {2}

item.title: [afc] Sol Ring
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}{C}.

item.title: [afc] Solemn Simulacrum
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Golem

When Solemn Simulacrum enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

When Solemn Simulacrum dies, you may draw a card.

item.title: [afc] Rakdos Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}: Add {B}{R}.

item.title: [afc] Orazca Relic
item.description:
Artifact

Ascend (If you control ten or more permanents, you get the city's blessing for the rest of the game.)

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}, Sacrifice Orazca Relic: You gain 3 life and draw a card. Activate only if you have the city's blessing.

item.title: [afc] Moonsilver Spear
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature has first strike.

Whenever equipped creature attacks, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying.

Equip {4}

item.title: [afc] Wayfarer's Bauble
item.description:
Artifact

{2}, {T}, Sacrifice Wayfarer's Bauble: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [afc] Viridian Longbow
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to any target."

Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery. This card enters the battlefield unattached and stays on the battlefield if the creature leaves.)

item.title: [afc] Unstable Obelisk
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}.

{7}, {T}, Sacrifice Unstable Obelisk: Destroy target permanent.

item.title: [afc] Talisman of Indulgence
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Add {B} or {R}. Talisman of Indulgence deals 1 damage to you.

item.title: [afc] Lightning Greaves
item.description:
Artifact — Equipment

Equipped creature has haste and shroud. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities.)

Equip {0}

item.title: [afc] Bant Panorama
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Bant Panorama: Search your library for a basic Forest, Plains, or Island card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [afc] Azorius Chancery
item.description:
Land

Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield tapped.

When Azorius Chancery enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.

{T}: Add {W}{U}.

item.title: [afc] Arcane Sanctum
item.description:
Land

Arcane Sanctum enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {W}, {U}, or {B}.

item.description:
Land

{1}, {T}: Add {U}{B}.

item.title: [afc] Crucible of the Spirit Dragon
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add {C}.

{1}, {T}: Put a storage counter on Crucible of the Spirit Dragon.

{T}, Remove X storage counters from Crucible of the Spirit Dragon: Add X mana in any combination of colors. Spend this mana only to cast Dragon spells or activate abilities of Dragons.

item.title: [afc] Command Tower
item.description:
Land

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

item.title: [afc] Cinder Glade
item.description:
Land — Mountain Forest

({T}: Add {R} or {G}.)

Cinder Glade enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

item.title: [afc] Choked Estuary
item.description:
Land

As Choked Estuary enters the battlefield, you may reveal an Island or Swamp card from your hand. If you don't, Choked Estuary enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {U} or {B}.

item.title: [afc] Canopy Vista
item.description:
Land — Forest Plains

({T}: Add {G} or {W}.)

Canopy Vista enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

item.title: [afc] Flood Plain
item.description:
Land

Flood Plain enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}, Sacrifice Flood Plain: Search your library for a Plains or Island card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.

Land

Dimir Aqueduct enters the battlefield tapped.

item.title: [afc] Desert
item.description:
Land — Desert

{T}: Add {C}.

{T}: Desert deals 1 damage to target attacking creature. Activate only during the end of combat step.

item.title: [afc] Foreboding Ruins
item.description:
Land

As Foreboding Ruins enters the battlefield, you may reveal a Swamp or Mountain card from your hand. If you don't, Foreboding Ruins enters the battlefield tapped.

{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

item.description:
Land

Gruul Turf enters the battlefield tapped.

When Gruul Turf enters the battlefield, return a land you control to its owner's hand.
